page.title: 09Agriculture in District
page.content: Farms have large ranges of buildings for housing crops,stock and implements during the winter months,all farms have mains electricity,and although some have private water supplies from wells or boreholes,most are connected to mains water supply. Up to threequarters of the land will be ploughed and cultivated this year for crop production.Major crops grown are Winter and Spring Barley,Winter Wheat,Oil Seed Rape,Potatoes,Oats,Peas and Swedes for stock feed.The farms are famous like the rest of Tweedside for producing good quality malting barley.During the last few years more crops such as Wheat,Barley and Oil Seed Rapehave been planted in the Autumn,this has the advantage of spreading the work load away from Springtime,and also allows for an earlier start to the harvest.
